name: VR Murder Crime investigation: Dark Jungle
name_original: VR Murder Crime investigation: Dark Jungle
description:
Being an agent of sherlock holmes your duty is to explore the unrealities of haunted house and find the real story behind every mock. Your first mission after taking step into The Scary House is to find they key to unlock room and reach to the orignal documents which should be the cause of the death of house owner. After finding those documents now find the dead body and explore a real cause of his death. The house is haunted so be careful at every step.
Features
Solve a case and explore keys.
Wear vr glasses to feel the real presence of sherlock.
Complete 360 degree horror rotation.
